titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Miscellaneous Historical Maps Collection, circa 1558-1989 (bulk 1820-1945)
titlestmt.author: Inventory prepared by Archives and Special Collections Library

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Emma Gronbeck, 2024

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Miscellaneous Historical Maps Collection

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: Collection of maps, charts, atlas pages, and illustrations depicting various regions of the globe ranging from the 16th to 20th centuries, with a particular focus on the United States and New York.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Collection of maps, charts, atlas pages, and illustrations depicting various regions of the globe ranging from the 16th to 20th centuries, with a particular focus on the United States and New York.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

p.archref: Breed Collection of Maps, Documents, and Prints
Edward Lasker Collection of Atlases and Maps
Richmond John Rathbone Collection of Rare Maps

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Assembled together from legacy map collections belonging to both Special Collections and the Vassar College Main Library, as well as more recent accessions. Items previously cataloged using the Dewey Decimal System, or a legacy cataloging system used by the Vassar College Library in the 20th century (call numbers beginning with "M"), are still identified with these former call numbers.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Miscellaneous Historical Maps Collection, Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The maps are organized into series roughly by geographic area. There is considerable overlap between the sub-series, though, so careful browsing is required to complete a thorough search of the collection.
Within each series, maps are arranged in alphabetical order by creator or title.

NORTH AMERICA — UNITED STATES — WASHINGTON, D.C.
